DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical research study is to assess the pharmacokinetics of atazanavir administered twice-daily relative to historical data from atazanavir/ritonavir 300/100 mg, given once daily.
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female subjects between the ages of 18 to 45 years old with a BMI of 18 to 30 kg/m2
